title: Student Verification
x-comments: This schema captures student identification and eligibility verification for equipment checkout, ensuring proper assignment and accountability.
x-implementation-notes: Frontend Implementation: 1) Implement student ID scanner or manual entry. 2) Display student information for verification. 3) Show equipment assignment history. 4) Validate student eligibility status.

studentId.title: Student ID Scan
studentId.description: Scan or enter student ID number

ui:options.tooltip:
Scan student ID card or manually enter student ID number.

Verification Requirements:
✓ Valid student ID in system
✓ Student is enrolled in band program
✓ No outstanding equipment or fees
✓ Parent/guardian permission forms on file
✓ Student meets age/grade requirements for instrument

Ensures proper equipment assignment and student accountability for borrowed instruments and equipment.

Verify student eligibility for equipment checkout.

Eligibility Requirements:
✓ Currently enrolled in band program
✓ Academic standing meets requirements
✓ All required forms and permissions on file
✓ No outstanding equipment or fees
✓ Appropriate skill level for requested equipment

Confirms student is authorized to check out band equipment and assumes responsibility for its care and return.
